test_scenarios.name: Successful Login
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the account dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: View Account Balance
test_scenarios.expected_result: Account details, including the current balance, are displayed correctly.

test_scenarios.name: Successful Internal Funds Transfer
steps: Select a 'To' account (must be an account within the same banking system/user).
test_scenarios.expected_result: Funds are transferred successfully between the selected accounts, and a confirmation message is displayed. Account balances are updated to reflect the transfer.
